advocacy_message: Third-party lab testing ensures every product meets Texas DSHS standards. By the book.

viral_hooks.opening: I've been doing this for years and THIS has never happened...
viral_hooks.closing: ...Texas is winning, and the best is yet to come.
quotable_lines: "Texas hemp is fantastic - absolutely destroying the competition, believe me."
"≤0.3% THC, 100% legal, 1000% Texas. That's compliance, folks."
"They said it couldn't be done. We did it anyway. That's the Texas way."
"From seed to sale, every step is fantastic. No shortcuts, no compromises."
"The cannabis revolution is here, and Texas is leading the charge."
